categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Geothray Camber was a Sector Plexus technician working in Imperial Intelligence. Camber proposed the creation of the Hyperspace Orbiting Scanner, a device capable of eavesdropping on virtually any computer by bypassing its security systems. However, Camber had several theoretical and technical problems, and sent a series of scandocs with specifications on to Doctor Lindu Sencker. Sencker's team overcame the problem in Camber's design and the Hyperspace Orbiting Scanner became a reality.
